Key Match Events: Vangelis Pavlidis scored a brace to secure victory for Greece
Harry Kane failed to capitalize on opportunities for England
England found it difficult to come out from the back and play their normal football
Pre-Game Insights: Lee Carsley emphasized the importance of controlling midfield possession
The match was dedicated to George Baldock, a former teammate of Greece players
Post-Match Reflections: Lee Carsley praised his team’s resilience after coming back from 2-0 down
George Baldock’s teammates expressed their grief and dedication to him during the match
Miscellaneous Highlights: Greece’s two-goal hero Vangelis Pavlidis dedicated the win to George Baldock
England’s captain John Stones expressed disappointment after the result
